title: Various Artists -album 3cd SoulCalibur V 2012
description:
Limited edition soundtrack for Soul Calibur V, composed by Junichi Nakatsuru, Hiroki Kikuta, Tomomki Miyoshi, Andrew and Jillian Aversa, Cris Velasco, Inon Zur and Jesper Kyd and performed by Eminence Symphony Orchestra. 

Creative Intelligence Arts RECORDS / SCV-0010112L / CD
Various Artists - SoulCalibur V Original Soundtrack [2012] [Soundtrack]
